mathematica: almostNatural[n_, b_] := Block[{m = 0, d = n, i = 1, l, p}, While[m <= d, l = m; m = (b - 1) i*b^(i - 1) + l; i++]; i--; p = Mod[d - l, i]; q = Floor[(d - l)/i] + b^(i - 1); If[p != 0, IntegerDigits[q, b][[p]], Mod[q - 1, b]]]; Array[ almostNatural[2^#, 10] &, 105, 0] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 27 2014 and modified Jul 15 2014 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
